overview: Lion vs The Little People is a documentary comedy about the greatest internet hoax of all time. In 2005, a hoax news post masquerading as a bonafide BBC news website article, announced a fight had taken place between a lion and an army of 42 fighting dwarfs. The hoax spread like wild fire across the internet before eventually being accepted to be fake. While the articleâ€™s veracity has been diminished, the myth lives on in this outrageous deadpan comedy.
title: Lion vs The Little People
